channel.title: The used - lies for the liars
channel.description:
Hey i downloaded the new "the used" album the other day, i have to say it has definatly made it into my top 10 albums ever :). Just love the songs on it. I suggest people who are into rock in any way download it. Some stuff on the album is soft and some is screaming... but what ever there is usually a song that you will like.
Just thought i'd post and say about how this album is really good.
